name: AVG
explanation: Calculates the average of a set of values.

name: COUNT
explanation: Counts the number of values in a set of values.

name: MAX
explanation: Returns the maximum value in a set of values.

name: MIN
explanation: Returns the minimum value in a set of values.

name: SUM
explanation: Calculates the sum of a set of values.

name: STRING_AGG
explanation: Aggregates values into a string, separated by a delimiter.

name: JSON_AGG
explanation: Aggregates values into a JSON array.

name: JSONB_AGG
explanation: Aggregates values into a JSONB array.

name: JSON_OBJECT_AGG
explanation: Aggregates values into a JSON object.

name: VAR_POP
explanation: Calculates the population variance of a set of values.

name: VAR_SAMP
explanation: Calculates the sample variance of a set of values.

name: STDDEV_POP
explanation: Calculates the population standard deviation of a set of values.

name: STDDEV_SAMP
explanation: Calculates the sample standard deviation of a set of values.
